title: Income Tax Exemption for Kota Development Authority u/s 10(46A) Notified by CBDT!
content:
# Income Tax Exemption for Kota Development Authority u/s 10(46A) Notified by CBDT!

Ek important update hai. Government ne Kota Development Authority ke liye income tax exemption announce kiya hai under Section 10(46A) of the Income-tax Act, 1961.

*   **What's New:** Central Government ne Kota Development Authority (KDA) ko Income-tax Act, 1961 ke Section 10(46A) ke तहत income tax exemption ke liye notify kiya hai.
*   **Notification Details:** Yeh exemption Notification No. 04/2026 – Income Tax, dated January 7, 2026, ke through notify kiya gaya hai.
*   **Authority:** Kota Development Authority ko Kota Development Authority Act, 2023 (Act No. 31 of 2023) ke under constitute kiya gaya hai.
*   **Effective From:** Yeh exemption Assessment Year 2025-26 se effective hoga.
*   **Key Condition:** Exemption tab tak applicable rahega jab tak KDA Kota Development Authority Act, 2023 ke under function karta rahega aur Section 10(46A) ke specified statutory purposes ko carry out karega.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Download the Official Notification/Circular here](https://www.incometax.gov.in/iec/foportal/latest-news/notifications)
